title: Nine Humorous Tales
description: A collection of short stories portraying life among the various strata of Russian society of the 19th century. Chekhov was a master of realism, and his stories remain models of economy and precision of language to this day. The tales 1. A Work of Art, 2. Vengeance, 3. Her Gentleman Friend, 4. Who Was She? , 5. The Scandal-Monger, 6. Carelessness, 7. That "Fresh Kid, " 8. Such Is Fame! , 9. Overspiced.
author: Anton Chekhov
